data.title: best pizza
data.text: the service was great our waitress (mikki) she was good we had the pretzel and bbq chicken pizza ,the crust was done perfect . they are a little expensive for pizza but it was good

data.title: Great Effort
data.text: I'm from Chicago, and I'm a pizza aficionado. I'm spoiled by Giordano's, Connies, and Lou Malnati's, but Mellow Mushroom is a more than adequate pizza when away from Chi-Town.

data.title: Waiting expected but...
data.text: Not the better of Mellow Mushroom' s.  Food was good, service was ok.  Waitress was first seemed to need to rush our selections.  Ordered Beer in can, apologized that bar was backed up but no one was over behind it.  Order 3 pretzels with beer cheese.  She was bring us 6, then realized it was not the right order. Took back instead of comping.  We had to wait again, they were fresh but beer cheese was half full and had remnants of a fuller bowl.  Pizza came right after we started eating pretzels.  Not the best MM, but food was good.

data.title: Great Evening Out
data.text: I have been here several times for work, but never with my family.  The kids had a great time. We visited on a Thursday for "kids eat free." My child and his friend told me the pizza was yummy and the pretzel was the best!

owner_response.author: Kevin S, General Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your awesome review! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Kevin Seelbinder
GM Mellow Mushroom Columbia
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food, expect to wait
data.text:
I have been to six of the Mellow Mushroom locations and found this one to be about average for Mellow Mushrooms (which is really better than average for pizza restaurants.)

The staff was friendly and the decor was very fun and quirky and localized for its location (near college campus of USC.)

For me this is a fantastic choice for a reasonably priced meal for a group and their food is really top quality for the price. Add in the fact that every one of their locations has some unique menu offerings and you have won me over for providing consistent product with a local flavor.

owner_response.author: Kevin S, General Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate your feedback and we are glad you consistantly get a great product from us. We take great pride in our food and hope to see you again soon. 

Kevin Seelbinder
GM Mellow Mushroom Columbia
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Pizza Place
data.text: This is your standard college pizza place, where the main attractions are the pizza and the beer.  The pizza is on par with most small chains.  The service was very good.

owner_response.author: Kevin S, General Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for the review. If there is anything we can do better to improve your experience please dont hesitate to contact me. Thanks again

Kevin Seelbinder
GM Mellow Mushroom Columbia
ksmellowsc@gmail.com
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best canzone in town
data.text: I make it a point to dine here at least twice every visit to Columbia. Their pizza and canzone are amazing.

owner_response.author: Kevin S, General Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for the 5 star review! We hope to see you again soon. 

Kevin Seelbinder
GM Mellow Mushroom Columbia
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Slow but good pizza!
data.text:
Took forever to be seated, and they weren't crowded. Forever for our drinks to be brought to the table. More tables were dirty than clean. Server slow as a sloth. 
On a positive note the food was good. It's a great location. 
I guess you are only paying for the food and not the service nor atmosphere!!!

owner_response.author: Kevin S, General Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for the review. I appreciate your feedback and would love to discuss further with you the details of your visit. 

Kevin Seelbinder
GM Mellow Mushroom Columbia
ksmellowsc@gmail.com
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Pizza
data.text: My daughter and I were pleasantly surprised to find good pizza in Columbia. She ordered a pizza similar to a Margherita pizza and I ordered a cheese pizza. The service was a little slow, but we didn't mind since the food was good.

owner_response.author: Kevin S, General Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your review and the 4 stars. We have taken the service issues very seriously and are making strides including new training to make the guest experience better. We hope to see you again soon. 

Kevin Seelbinder
GM Mellow Mushroom Columbia
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Chain restaurant but good food
data.text: Enjoy these wherever we can find one.  Seating can be very tight here.  Service not as good as others we have been to but ok.

owner_response.author: Kevin S, General Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Malcolm,
Thank you for your review and the 4 starts. I am dissapointed to hear that our service was lacking. We have high standards and your review has been shared with our staff. Thank you again and we hope to see you again. 

Kevin Seelbinder
GM Mellow Mushroom Columbia
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fantastic pizza
data.text: I've eaten at mellow mushrooms across the south, always a great place for beer and pizzas. They have a huge variety of pizza choices, not traditional pizzas, you have to be open to trying new flavor combos. Trust the mushroom and dive into one of their pizzas

owner_response.author: Kevin S, General Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your amazing review of Mellow Mushroom! We appreciate it and look forward to your next visit. 

Kevin Seelbinder
General Manager
Mellow Mushroom, Columbia
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pizza with a bit of whimsy.
data.text: If you want to step out of your comfort zone and get a little crazy, this should help you out.  Great restaurant ; has its own vibe and decor.  Food was good, prices fair and waitstaff very pleasant.  It was a fun , relaxing meal.

owner_response.author: Kevin S, General Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am glad we could give you an amazing experience. We hope to see you again soon!

Kevin Seelbinder
General Manager
Mellow Mushroom, Columbia
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Vista pizza
data.text: One block from the Capitol on Gervais in the Vista. Old building left rustic. Seating on ground level and up stairs. (Mostly pizza and beer but salads and. other items on the menu.) We had lunch after a youth baseball game and this was the teen agers choice. Good food and good service. Same as our experience in other locations of this chain.

owner_response.author: Kevin S, General Manager at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for you review! We are glad you enjoyed your visit and good luck to your youth baseball team!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun restaurant in a convenient location.
data.text: Mellow Mushroom is well situated in the Vista, and serves fantastic pizza.  The beer selection is strong, and it always has a lively atmosphere.

owner_response.author: john w, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the great review, We hope to see you again soon!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Just Poor
data.text: Mellow Mushroom has sub-par service, is always busy and always has a slow response time for drinks and food orders. The food is average at best. There are too many other good restaurants in the area to go back to Mellow Mushroom.

owner_response.author: john w, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our restaurant. Please reach out to me so we can discuss this further.

John Wallace
Mellow Mushroom of Columbia
803-447-5775
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great variety!
data.text: We had two different types of pizza and bruschetta. Everything was good. The barbecue pizza was a surprise.  It was really good! Friendly atmosphere! Great location in downtown Columbia.

owner_response.author: john w, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the great review!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: MMMMellow Mushroom
data.text: Atmosphere was fun.  Service was good.  I like the fact that Mellow Mushroom has been pretty consistent everywhere I've had it (Anniston & Birmingham, AL, Atlanta & Athens, GA, Columbia, SC).  I always get the salad and it's always good.  I like the numerous selections they have for people on all kinds of diets.  My hubby is a vegetarian and they satisfy him from the salads & sandwiches to the pizza & appetizers.  I have to go low carb.  The fact that they provide a wide variety of flavorful salads won me over!  It's usually hard to have salad while the kids and hubby eat pizza but Mellow Mushroom makes it easy.  This location is no different.

owner_response.author: john w, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the great review!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Can you say martini??
data.text: What I remember most about the Mellow Mushroom was the martini. The wings were really good too. I'll definitely give it another shot.

owner_response.author: john w, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the great review!1 we hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Food Great & Gluten Free Options
data.text: We were a group of 4 and 2 had special dietary orders.  The restaurant was perfect and it was options for everyone.  We will visit again

owner_response.author: john w, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average pizza
data.text: Nice place to dine with "hungry kids."   Friendly environment.   Modestly priced.    Pizza is ok - not terrific, not bad - just ok -- nothing special or extraordinary.

owner_response.author: john w, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We would love to hear what could have made your experience better. Please reach out to me at 803-447-5775. Thank you for taking the time to give us a review!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
